Module kivakit.ui.desktop
Package com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.geometry

Class DrawingCoordinateSystem

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.geometry.DrawingCoordinateSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.naming.Named, Coordinated, CoordinateSystem
Direct Known Subclasses:
Java2dDrawingSurface
public class DrawingCoordinateSystem extends Object implements CoordinateSystem
Maps to and from a given bounded coordinate system using simple rectangular interpolation.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:
CoordinateSystem
